com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.objects.inventory.action

Class Action.Companion

  • com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.objects.inventory.action.Action.Companion
  • Enclosing class:
    Action

    public static class Action.Companion

    • Method Detail

      • of

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public Action of(@NotNull
                                      Inventory inventory,
                                      int slot,
                                      @NotNull
                                      java.lang.String typeString)

        Creates a new action. The Inventory must be a container, see {@link Inventory#isContainer()}. The slot can be -999 for outside of the gui

        Parameters:
        inventory - the inventory to complete the action on
        slot - the slot to complete the action on
        typeString - the type of action to do (CLICK, DRAG, KEY)
        Returns:
        the new action
